description:
Providing inner-city convenience from its incredibly central location, immerse yourself in the best of what 4006 has to offer. With a huge range of restaurants, entertainment and shopping precincts at your door, apartment 319 of 977 Ann Street promises low-maintenance living and a lock-up-and-go lifestyle. Enjoy the fantastic onsite facilities and bathe in the convenience of the location, this property is ready to be lived in or leased out.

This residence features:
- An open plan living arrangement complete with bi-fold windows and plenty of natural light. The outlook is towards a small office building, providing plenty of privacy after hours.
- Unleash your inner Masterchef with the contemporary kitchen complete with gas cooking, breakfast bar, dishwasher and plenty of cupboard space.
- One (1) spacious bedroom with built-in wardrobes, built-in study desk, fans & air conditioning.
- One (1) modern bathroom with internal laundry.
- Resort-style roof-top facilities with views into the CBD containing a pool, BBQ area & gym.
- Currently rented for $390 per week until March. Fantastic yields at 6.76% Gross.
- Addtional information: Body Corporate: $1080 per quarter (Approx), Council Rates: $430 per quarter & Water Rates: $230 per quarter.

You'll never need the added costs of having a car again with a massive range of inner-city shopping districts quite literally at your door including Emporium, James Street and Gasworks Plaza. An endless supply of the best dining and food precincts are in every direction whilst parkland and the Brisbane River is just a short bike ride away. Grab yourself an electric scooter and have the easiest commute to the Brisbane CBD or Southbank!

Contact Nicholas McCluskey on 0416 121 550 to arrange your inspection.
